name: Tipsy Rescue
description:
Story
"Tipsy Rescue Game" is a puzzle game designed to unlock the phone's various locks. Your objective is to safely guide our friend, who has fallen asleep after drinking, home by navigating through the apps on the phone.

Gameplay
This puzzle game is available for both PC and mobile devices, requiring players to use a mouse (or touch screen) and keyboard to solve the challenges presented. The game is centered around the phone's screen, where you must uncover passwords for locked sections by gathering clues from the content within various apps. Players are free to explore nine different apps on the phone to gather hints. Once you discover her address, you can call a taxi to ensure she safely reaches home.
